mpmToolbox.gui.audio

Class AudioDocumentData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alee.extended.tab.DocumentData<com.alee.laf.panel.WebPanel>
      • mpmToolbox.gui.audio.AudioDocumentData

  • public class AudioDocumentData
extends com.alee.extended.tab.DocumentData<com.alee.laf.panel.WebPanel>
    A custom DocumentData object for the audio analysis component.
